content: this legal text summarizes a court case that has been ongoing for 9 years the court has made a final ruling rejecting objections made by one party and ordering the defendant to pay compensation to the plaintiff the case involves the dissolution of a community inheritance and the division of various properties including a villa and agricultural land an expert was appointed by the court to estimate the value of the properties and prepare a divisional project the court considered the historical and architectural value of the properties in making its decision the defendant objected to the divisional project but the court found their objections to be unfounded the court approved the divisional project and ordered the defendant to pay compensation to the plaintiff for the exclusive use of the agricultural land the court also determined that the costs of the case should be shared between the parties the court of turin made the final ruling after considering the arguments and objections from both parties the court rejected the objections made by the defendant and declared the draft order from 08132018 and the amended order from 01172019 to be enforceable the defendant was ordered to pay the plaintiff a sum of €21050 along with legal interest as compensation for the month of february 2010 both parties were also ordered to bear the costs of the litigation with the defendant responsible for half of the expenses the ruling was made on 02082019 by judge dr name
